sourcesContent:
import { gql } from 'apollo-boost'


export const GET_PORTFOLIO = gql`
query Portfolio($id: ID) {
  portfolio (id: $id) {
    _id,
    title,
    company,
    companyWebsite
    location
    jobTitle
    description
    startDate
    endDate
  }
}
`

export const GET_PORTFOLIOS = gql`
query Portfolios {
  portfolios {
    _id,
    title,
    company,
    companyWebsite
    location
    jobTitle
    description
  }
}
`
